# ğŸ§  Proxyless LLM Web Search Engine A multi-search engine LLM web retrieval tool that does not require a proxy, supporting URL content parsing and web crawling, combined with LangGraph to realize modular agent chains. Designed specifically for external knowledge invocation scenarios for large language models, it supports **Playwright + Crawl4AI** web acquisition and parsing, supports asynchronous concurrency, content chunking, and reranking/filtering. ## âœ¨ Features Overview - ğŸŒ **Proxyless**: Supports domestic browsers via Playwright configuration, enabling web search without the need for a proxy. - ğŸ” **Multi-Search Engine Support**: Supports mainstream search engines such as Bing, Quark, Baidu, Sogou, enhancing the diversity of information sources. - ğŸ¤– **Intent Recognition**: The system can automatically determine whether to perform a web search or parse a URL based on user input. - ğŸ”„ **Query Decomposition**: Automatically decomposes queries into multiple subtasks according to the user's search intent, executing them sequentially to improve search relevance and efficiency. - âš™ï¸ **Agent Architecture**: Encapsulates **"web_search"** and **"link_parser"** based on **LangGraph**. - ğŸƒâ€â™‚ï¸ **Asynchronous Concurrent Task Processing**: Supports asynchronous concurrent task processing, efficiently handling multiple search tasks. - ğŸ“ **Optimized Content Processing**: - âœ‚ï¸ **Content Chunking**: Divides long web content into segments. - ğŸ”„ **Content Reranking**: Intelligently reorders content to enhance information relevance. - ğŸš« **Content Filtering**: Automatically removes irrelevant or duplicate content. - ğŸŒ **Multi-terminal Support**: - ğŸ–¥ï¸ Provides FastAPI backend interface, which can be integrated into any system. - ğŸŒ Offers Gradio Web UI for rapid deployment as a visual application. - ğŸ§©[ **Browser Extension Support**](https://github.com/itshyao/proxyless-llm-websearch/tree/main/extension): Supports Edge, providing an intelligent URL parsing extension, enabling web page parsing and content extraction requests directly in the browser. ![workflow](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/itshyao/proxyless-llm-websearch/main/img/workflow.png) ![framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/itshyao/proxyless-llm-websearch/main/img/framework.png) ## âš¡ Quick Start ### 1. Clone the repository

RowTranslations.translatedContent: A multi-search engine LLM web retrieval tool that does not require a proxy, supporting URL content parsing and web crawling, combined with LangGraph to realize modular agent chains. Designed specifically for external knowledge invocation scenarios for large language models, it supports **Playwright + Crawl4AI** web acquisition and parsing, supports asynchronous concurrency, content chunking, and reranking/filtering.
- ğŸŒ **Proxyless**: Supports domestic browsers via Playwright configuration, enabling web search without the need for a proxy.
- ğŸ” **Multi-Search Engine Support**: Supports mainstream search engines such as Bing, Quark, Baidu, Sogou, enhancing the diversity of information sources.
- ğŸ¤– **Intent Recognition**: The system can automatically determine whether to perform a web search or parse a URL based on user input.
- ğŸ”„ **Query Decomposition**: Automatically decomposes queries into multiple subtasks according to the user's search intent, executing them sequentially to improve search relevance and efficiency.
- âš™ï¸ **Agent Architecture**: Encapsulates **"web_search"** and **"link_parser"** based on **LangGraph**.
- ğŸƒâ€â™‚ï¸ **Asynchronous Concurrent Task Processing**: Supports asynchronous concurrent task processing, efficiently handling multiple search tasks.
- âœ‚ï¸ **Content Chunking**: Divides long web content into segments.
- ğŸ”„ **Content Reranking**: Intelligently reorders content to enhance information relevance.
- ğŸš« **Content Filtering**: Automatically removes irrelevant or duplicate content.
- ğŸ–¥ï¸ Provides FastAPI backend interface, which can be integrated into any system.
- ğŸŒ Offers Gradio Web UI for rapid deployment as a visual application.

- ğŸ§©[ **Browser Extension Support**](https://github.com/itshyao/proxyless-llm-websearch/tree/main/extension): Supports Edge, providing an intelligent URL parsing extension, enabling web page parsing and content extraction requests directly in the browser.

Content:
```python
'''
python demo.py
'''

from pools import BrowserPool, CrawlerPool
from agent import ToolsGraph
import asyncio

async def main():
    browser_pool = BrowserPool(pool_size=1)
    crawler_pool = CrawlerPool(pool_size=1)
    
    graph = ToolsGraph(browser_pool, crawler_pool, engine="bing")

    await browser_pool._create_browser_instance(headless=True)
    await crawler_pool._get_instance()

    result = await graph.run("å¹¿å·ä»Šæ—¥å¤©æ°”")

    await browser_pool.cleanup()
    await crawler_pool.cleanup()

    print(result)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    asyncio.run(main())
```
Translation:
```python
'''
python demo.py
'''

from pools import BrowserPool, CrawlerPool
from agent import ToolsGraph
import asyncio

async def main():
    browser_pool = BrowserPool(pool_size=1)
    crawler_pool = CrawlerPool(pool_size=1)
    
    graph = ToolsGraph(browser_pool, crawler_pool, engine="bing")

    await browser_pool._create_browser_instance(headless=True)
    await crawler_pool._get_instance()

    result = await graph.run("å¹¿å·ä»Šæ—¥å¤©æ°”")

    await browser_pool.cleanup()
    await crawler_pool.cleanup()

    print(result)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    asyncio.run(main())
```

## ğŸ” Comparison with Online Web Search Tests

We compared the project with some mainstream online APIs to evaluate its performance on complex questions.

### ğŸ”¥ Dataset

- The dataset comes from Alibaba's released [WebWalkerQA](https://huggingface.co/datasets/callanwu/WebWalkerQA), containing 680 challenging questions covering multiple fields such as education, academic conferences, and gaming.
- The dataset includes questions in both Chinese and English.

### ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ« Comparison Results

| Search Engine/System | âœ… Correct | âŒ Incorrect | âš ï¸ Partially Correct |
| -------------------- | ---------- | ------------ | -------------------- |
| **Volcano Ark**      | 5.00%      | 72.21%       | 22.79%               |
| **Bailian**          | 9.85%      | 62.79%       | 27.35%               |
| **Our**              | 19.85%     | 47.94%       | 32.06%               |

## ğŸ™ Acknowledgments

Some features of this project benefited from the support and inspiration of the following open-source projects, hereby acknowledged:

- ğŸ§  [LangGraph](https://github.com/langchain-ai/langgraph): Used for building modular intelligent agent chain frameworks.
- ğŸ•· [Crawl4AI](https://github.com/unclecode/crawl4ai): A powerful web content parsing tool.
